equation:
\begin{equation}
Q = \left(\begin{array}{cc} 0&q\\
s  q^T &0 \end{array}\right)\qquad
\bar Q = \left(\begin{array}{cc} 0&\bar q \\
s  \bar{q}^T &0 \end{array}\right)\,.
\

\begin{equation}
Q\rightarrow \left(\begin{array}{cc} 0&U_1 q U_2^T\\ s  U_2q^T U_1^T &0
\end{array} \right)\qquad
\

\begin{equation} \prod_{i=1}^n U(N_i) \otimes \prod_{j=1}^k U(\tilde
N_j)\otimes \left\{
\begin{array}{cc} SO(N_0) & \mathrm{for}\, s=1 \\ Sp(\frac{N_0}{2})  & \mathrm{for}\, s=-1 \end{array}\right.
\

\begin{equation} Z_{N,s,\varepsilon} = {1\over \Vol U(N)} \times \int \d
M \d Q \exp\left[ -N \tr V(M) + i \tr Q^\dag M Q \right]~,
\label{eq:Z-def}
\

\begin{equation} \tilde Z_{N,s,\varepsilon} = \int_{\R +i\varepsilon\ } \prod_{k=1}^N d\lambda_k
\, e^{-N^2 S} \quad {\rm and} \quad C_{N,s} = {2^{-N^2/2+N} \over \Vol
  (U(1)^N\times S_N)} \big(i\pi\big)^{N(N+s)/2} ~~,
\label{eq:Zt}
\

\begin{equation} {\cal Z}(t, \mu) =
\int_{\R + i \varepsilon\ } \prod_{k=1}^N d\lambda_k \, e^{-N^2 S_\mu } \quad
{\rm where} \quad S_\mu = S + \sum_{\alpha=1}^r \mu_\alpha f_\alpha ~.
\

\begin{equation}
W'_{odd}(z)=t_{2\delta+1} z(z^2-x_1)\dots (z^2-x_\delta)=
t_{2\delta+1} z (z-{\tilde z}_1^+)(z-{\tilde z}_1^-)\dots (z-{\tilde
  z}_\delta^+)(z-{\tilde z}_\delta^-)~~, \

\begin{equation} 
{\cal A}_\alpha\cap {\cal B}_\beta=- {\cal B}_\alpha\cap {\cal
  A}_\beta=\delta_{\alpha,\beta}~~,~~ {\cal A}_\alpha\cap {\cal A}_\beta=
  {\cal B}_\alpha\cap {\cal B}_\beta=0 ~~{\rm for~all}~~ \alpha=-q\dots q~~.
\

\begin{equation}\label{gaugetrafos}
\delta M = i [ \Lambda, M]\,, \qquad \delta Q = i ( \Lambda Q + Q \Lambda^T)
\, \qquad \delta \bar Q = -i (\Lambda^T \bar Q + \bar Q \Lambda )
\

\begin{equation}
S_{gf} = \mathbf{s}\, \Tr \left( \sum_{i\ne j} (\bar C_{ij} m_{ij}) + \bar
C_{q} q_{23} + \bar C_{00} q_{00} \right)\,.
\

\begin{equation}
G_s = U(N_1)\times U(N_2) \times \left\{ \begin{array}{cc} SO(N_0) & s=+1 \\
Sp(\frac{N_0}{2}) & s=-1
\end{array}\right.\,.
\

\begin{equation}\label{Mconstraints}
m_{22} = - m_{33}^T \qquad \mathrm{and}\qquad m_{00}\mathrm{\bf E}_s +
\mathrm{\bf E}_s m_{00}^T=0\,.
\

\begin{equation} S_{\mathrm{ADE}}=\sum_{i=1}^r \tr
W_{(i)}(M^{(i)}) + \sum_{i,j=1}^r s_{ij}\tr Q_{(ij)} M^{(j)} Q_{(ji)}\ 
.
\label{quiveraction}\
